title: Gay Sex Ed
overview: Let's talk about sex! RuPaul's Drag Race queens Vanessa Vanjie Mateo and Kameron Michaels (aka Kamjie) take viewers to class! The surprisingly informative and highly entertaining series features topics on all things â€˜Sex Ed' from a gay male perspective, with certified sex therapist Dr. Chris Donaghue providing his expert opinion on the topic of the week. Gay Sex Ed, it's everything you didn't learn in High School.
